title: Setting Up HTTPS Security
description:
Here at TrackMaven, we have made it our goal to provide our customers with the most secure access to our application as possible. And in light of the recent news emerging in web security, most concerning Heartbleed, we rethought our best practices and now limit access to our application to only secured HTTPS and making sure that we have the full range of coverage based off of SSL Lab's standards for security. It is often thought that securing your site through TSL/SSL is hard, but hopefully this post will show you just how easy it can be.

What is HTTPS?

Hypertext Transfer Protocol Secure (HTTPS) is a way in which computers can securely communicate over the internet. The secure communication is done either the through the newer Transport Layer Security (TLS) encryption protocol or its predecessor the SSL Secure Sockets Layer (SLS) encryption protocol.
